select id, title , content , deleted_at , created_at , updated_at , count(1) over() total_count from messages where 1 = 1 and deleted_at is null
and title like '%'|| #{searchStr} ||'%'
and created_at between to_date(#{startDate}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and to_date(#{endDate}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') + 1
order by updated_at desc
limit #{length} offset #{beginNo}
select id, title , content , deleted_at , to_char(created_at , 'YYYY-MM-DD') as created_at , to_char(updated_at , 'YYYY-MM-DD') as updated_at from messages where 1 = 1 and id = #{id}

select currval('messages_id_seq')
